techmeme.title: China announces new rules requiring companies to label AI-generated material, either explicitly or via metadata, starting September 1 (Debby Wu/Bloomberg)
Sources: DeepSeek and its hedge fund parent, High-Flyer Capital, forbid some R&D staff from traveling abroad freely, asking them to hand in their passports (The Information)
Sources: Russia is using bitcoin, ether, and stablecoins such as Tether in its oil trade with China and India to skirt Western sanctions (Reuters)
European authorities raided 21 addresses, arrested several people, and sealed two offices in the EU Parliament, as part of a spiraling bribery probe into Huawei (Politico)
Foxconn CEO Young Liu says "the attitude and the approach" of the US government toward tariffs has become a "big headache" for companies like Apple and Amazon (Kathrin Hille/Financial Times)
